welcome_message_body: Welcome to La Grita, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful architecture. We hope you enjoy your time here and explore all the wonderful sights and experiences it has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at La Fria Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at La Fria Airport handles the transportation of goods and supplies.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Cristobal Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at San Cristobal Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.
